Html: Is it possible to specify the output device when using wasapi like you can with waveout?

I've updated the NAudio demo to show how to do this

Mark

Very nice!  Thank you for adding the function overload to include MMDevice as an option.  This will allow me to get wasapi in exclusive mode with a secondary sound device, in this case an M2Tech Evo usb to spdif converter.

The demo code update is nice also, it clearly shows those like myself that are new to the project how to deal with selecting the correct device.
